properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c2 v2 c2 v3 c2 v4 c2 v5 c2 c1

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prathi vaadu mokshamu jera prabhu Yesu varthanu vinare{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papatmulanabaduvari bharambudeeyanugori Prabhu Yesu chupinadaari paramandu sukhamidudaari{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ye jaathi varalainan ye desavaasulainan Yemaina bedamuleka Yesayya brochunu vega{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papatmule thanasutulu prabhu yesuniki snehitulu Nee papamella boyen neekinka mokshamu kalugun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prayasapadi baramunu mosedi O prajalara Prabhu Yesu kristu meeku prashaanthi nitchunu randi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesayya gaakanu vere yevaraina lerika rare Doshambulellanu bapi aashirvadinchunu gaachi{/lang-eng}
